item.title: Monopoly GO: Free Dice Roll Links (Updated Daily)
item.description:
Monopoly GO is a fun board game that combines the classic Monopoly experience with cool additional features and a city-building element. In the game, players can move their pieces to earn money and then use that money to build new buildings, upgrade their houses, and much more. The ultimate goal is to drive other players into bankruptcy by acquiring all pieces of property, essentially creating a “monopoly.”

In Monopoly GO , players move according to the roll of dice they get, and the game proceeds with renting, trading, and buying properties. If players have finished their dice rolls and want to get some more, here’s how they can do it.

Updated by Umama Ali on Oct 24, 2024: Without dice, you can’t roll around the board, build landmarks, or participate in any tournaments. Running out of dice can slow down your progress in Monopoly GO , leaving you at a disadvantage compared to other players. To become the rightful tycoon, you need a steady supply of dice. We’ve updated this guide with a bunch of new links that offer free dice roll links so that you can keep building in Monopoly GO . Check back regularly to find new Monopoly GO links.

We discovered two new dice links on October 24. You can find all the active Monopoly GO dice links in the table below.

Free Monopoly GO Dice Links For Today

While your dice rolls slowly replenish over time, you can use Dice Links to get free dice rolls instantly. Dice Links are a quick and easy way to grab free dice and keep the action going in Monopoly GO .

Here are all the active Monopoly GO Dice Links for October 2024 to help you participate in ongoing events and tournaments and complete boards easily.

Monopoly GO Dice Links

Date

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 21 - Oct 24

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 21 - Oct 24

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 24 - Oct 28

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 23 - Oct 26

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 22 - Oct 25

25 x Dice Rolls

Sep 26 - Oct 28

Dice links can only be redeemed once per account . Additionally, links expire after a certain amount of time. If you click a link, and it says "This reward cannot be claimed", then that particular link is no longer valid.

Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links

  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls

How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO

To redeem these links, tycoons can follow these simple steps:

  • Open a link on your phone. This will launch the Monopoly GO app on your device.
  • All you need to do then is click 'Collect,' and you'll get dice rolls for free.

How To Get Free Dice Rolls In Monopoly Go

Login Daily

Like most mobile games nowadays, Monopoly GO also offers incentives for players so that they frequently play the game. One of the daily treats is free dice rolls, so logging in daily is one way to get them. In addition to dice rolls, players have the chance to win other exciting prizes as well.

Invite Friends

Monopoly GO offers generous rewards for players who successfully invite others to join the game. If a player invites a friend, and the invited friend joins the game, both of them get 30 extra rolls . Players can keep getting 30 free rolls for inviting up to 30 friends , given that they accept the invitation.

Collect Community Chest Rewards

Community chests are great because they offer a variety of rewards. Players can open these chests to earn money, and if they help a friend with a community chest, they can earn some free rolls.

To make the most out of the community chest, players must ensure that they have at least 9 active in-game friends.

Complete Sticker Albums

Players collect stickers throughout Monopoly GO , and they aren’t just a fun part of the game; they can help players get dice rolls , too. For every sticker set or album that players complete, they receive dice rolls. While the free rolls earned through sticker albums are more than those obtained after completing a set, the process of completing an album can be more time-consuming.

Participate in Events and Tournaments

If you want a bunch of dice rolls, consider participating in events and tournaments. The game introduces new events regularly, and by completing their milestones, you can claim dice rolls, different sticker packs, in-game money, and various other exciting prizes . Tournaments also pack a lot of stellar rewards, so players should aim to secure a high position on the tournament leaderboard to make the most of them.

Special Events

Apart from the main events and tournaments, Monopoly GO also has a number of special events. From Free Parking to Wheel Boost, the game offers many events to help you grab some dice rolls. However, their timings change every day, so you can check out our daily events schedule guide to know when they happen.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Trick Or Treat 2024 Event Guide
item.description:
The Halloween season is finally here in Disney Dreamlight Valley , and with it returns the annual Trick Or Treat event. During this event, Dreamers will be completing many fun tasks like finding colorful candies around the valley, crafting spooky Halloween items, and completing different village duties.

The Trick or Treat event runs from October 23 to November 1 in Dreamlight Valley . Since Halloween is on October 31, make sure to jump in and grab all the cool rewards before the event ends. Check out this guide for a detailed overview of the Trick Or Treat event in Disney Dreamlight Valley .

Complete Trick Or Treat 2024 Event Guide

The Trick or Treat event brings tons of fun duties that Dreamers can complete to earn some spooky Halloween rewards. Here’s everything you’ll be doing in this event:

Find All Candy Buckets

Your first task is to collect the following three types of Candy Buckets from the valley:

  • Green Candy Bucket
  • Red Candy Bucket
  • Purple Candy Bucket.

These candy buckets will spawn randomly in the Plaza while the event is live. Since the Plaza is free to access for everyone, this task is easy, even for beginners. Each bucket gives you three candies in its color. For example, if players find a Purple Candy Bucket, they will get three purple candies. You can find one bucket a day before October 31 , but after that, more will show up.

Craft Mickey’s Halloween Candy Bowl

Next, you’ll have the chance to make Mickey’s Halloween Candy Bowl. Here are the ingredients for it:

  • 5 x Clay
  • 2 x Green Candy
  • 2 x Purple Candy
  • 2 x Red Candy.

DDV players can collect candies from their specific color buckets in the Plaza. To get Clay, you’ll need to dig in the Glade of Trust, Sunlit Plateau, or Forgotten Lands. Once you've collected everything, go to a crafting station and combine the materials to make Mickey’s Halloween Candy Bowl.

Complete Village Tasks

Finally, Dreamers need to complete five village duties during the Trick or Treat event. Here’s a quick breakdown of the tasks and how to get them done:

Village Duty

What to Do

Amount

Sugar Rush

Eat a meal made with a sweet ingredient (like Candy)

15 30 40

Trick or Treat

Gift Candies to 10 Villagers

25

A 3-Course Halloween Meal!

Eat all 3 types of Candy

10

Villainy Wears Many Masks

Wear a Mask

One

Stockpiling Pumpkins

Harvest Pumpkins

100

After completing these tasks, players will be rewarded with many different items like the Mickey Mouse Pumpkin, Happy Jack-O'-Lantern, Purple Trick-or-Treater's Bounty, Green Trick-or-Treater's Bounty, and a Pumpkin Stack.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Leak Reveals Interesting Astral Express Feature
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • An upcoming Honkai: Star Rail update may introduce a new bathtub feature for character buffs, including increased ATK and Ultimate DMG.
  • Fans have been eager for more interactive aspects on the Astral Express.
  • Version 2.7 could also include a character selector and new 5-star characters.

A Honkai: Star Rail leak revealed a rumored new bathtub feature coming to the Astral Express in an upcoming update. This might be good news for Honkai: Star Rail fans requesting more things to do on the cosmic train.

Unlike its predecessors, Honkai Impact 3rd and Genshin Impact , Honkai: Star Rail doesn't have a housing feature. Since the release of the gacha game, many fans have been asking HoYoverse to let them customize the Astral Express, and not just use it as a mere stopover. While the developer hasn't addressed these requests, it's also slowly introducing simple design features, like adding a TV set from Penacony, to some parts of the train.

According to a new leak, it seems like Honkai: Star Rail might add another feature to the Astral Express to make it more interactive. Prominent leaker HomDGCat reported that Honkai: Star Rail Version 2.7 will introduce a bathtub feature where the Trailblazer can bathe and use lotions to get special buffs. There are also different types of baths and relaxing routines that can provide different effects, like increased ATK and Ultimate DMG.

Rumored Honkai: Star Rail Bathtub Feature Leak Explained

  • Bath Efficacy: Increases ATK
  • Clear Fragrance: Increased Ultimate DMG
  • Mysterious Massage: Follow-up ATK DMG increased
  • Warm Current: DoT dealt by characters increased

In the comments, many Honkai: Star Rail fans expressed appreciation for a possible new way to buff up their characters' stats. One also pointed out that it's similar to how Zenless Zone Zero 's Sixth Street ramen shop provides temporary combat buffs. Meanwhile, some speculate that the bathtub buffs could depend on the active character or their current party, but it's still unclear if this would be the case.

Right now, the Astral Express only has two accessible bedrooms -- March 7th and Dan Heng's rooms -- and a parlor car where visitors hang out. There's one room that's still locked, and many Honkai: Star Rail fans believe that it might be the Trailblazer's own bedroom in the future, which they could hopefully customize. But with the leaked bathtub feature, it's possible that the locked room could be converted into a relaxing bathroom.

What to Expect in Honkai: Star Rail Version 2.7

Honkai: Star Rail just released Version 2.6, but there are already theories about what might happen in Version 2.7. The next update will debut the 5-star characters Sunday and Fugue (aka Tingyun), which might mean that the story will take place in either Penacony or Xianzhou Luofu. Plus, with Version 2.7 being the final update for the year, fans are really expecting big changes.

item.title: The Sims 4: Best Mods For Gardening
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Elevate the gardening activity with transformative mods for The Sims 4. Say goodbye to tedious tasks and seasonal limitations.
  • Enjoy autonomy with the Autonomous Gardening Mod and cut gardening times in half with the Faster Gardening Mod.
  • Expand one's gardening experience with mods like Gardening For All Seasons, Farmer Career, and Fertilize & Evolve All Mod.

With all its new content releases and storytelling elements, some forget that The Sims 4 can be a relaxing and satisfying garden simulation game. Like many other sandbox simulation games, players have the freedom to design a vibrant garden, big or small, with colorful plants and crops. Revolutionize a Sim's gardening game with some of the most transformative mods for The Sims 4 .

Each is designed to elevate a Sim's dream garden potential and make a player's experience easier, from streamlining garden maintenance to introducing new and innovative career paths. Say goodbye to tedious tasks and seasonal limitations and dive into a world where gardening knows no bounds.

Updated on October 24, 2024, by Jenna Amore: Gardening in The Sims 4 has always been a rewarding activity, but it can sometimes feel limited or time-consuming. This update includes new mods that enhance and simplify the gardening experience, giving players more options to customize and care for their virtual gardens. From functional compost bins and automated garden tenders to an expanded selection of harvestables, these mods add depth, convenience, and creativity to one of the game’s most beloved hobbies.

13 Cottage Garden Stuff

Transform Sims' Gardens And Wardrobes With Cozy, Cottagecore Charm

  • Created by Plumbob Tea Society
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

Players can get their Sims fit for gardening with this custom-made stuff pack, Cottage Garden Stuff, with a total of 171 new items. The pack features both build/buy mode objects and Create-A-Sim content. Decorate earthy homes and greenhouses with new plants, decorations, and garden clutter such as wheelbarrows and watering cans.

Dress Sims in new hairstyles, outfits, and accessories that are not only perfect for gardening but also for those who like cozy and woodland aesthetics. This custom stuff pack, made in collaboration with a variety of Sims creators, pairs perfectly with the style of packs like Cottage Living and Get Together .

12 Caigel Garden Sign Collection

Organize Gardens With Customized Signs For Every Crop And Season

  • Created by Caigel
  • Download Here (Mod The Sims)

The Caigel Garden Sign Collection mod is a must-have for players who want to keep their gardens well-organized and visually appealing. This mod adds a variety of custom signs to help distinguish between different crops and plants, making it easy to identify what's growing in each plot.

There’s a sign for every harvestable crop in the game, including those from the base game and packs like Island Living , Cottage Living , and Realm of Magic. This mod allows gardeners to sort and manage their produce with ease, increasing both functionality and aesthetic appeal. In addition to crop-specific signs, the mod also includes seasonal icons, making it simple to plan gardens according to the seasons.

11 Harvest And Gather

Grow A Diverse Garden With Unique Custom Harvestables

  • Created by BrazenLotus
  • Download Here (brazen-lotus)

Sims can add variety to their gardens with 73 new options for seeds and ingredients. Players can now cultivate a wide range of plants, from everyday fruits and vegetables like cucumbers, oranges, and pumpkins to specialty ingredients like cinnamon, coffee beans, and lavender.

These downloadables allow for more creative gardening, letting Sims grow exactly what they need for cooking, herbalism, or simply enhancing their garden's diversity. The new ingredients and produce can either be purchased using the Brazen Delivery service or found in the Activities section of the buy catalog when the showhiddenobjects cheat is enabled.

10 No Fig Deal Garden Care System

Forget To Tend The Garden? No Fig Deal!

  • Created by RAVASHEEN
  • Download Here (ravasheen)

The No Fig Deal Garden Care System mod makes garden maintenance easier for Sims who want to keep their crops thriving without constant attention. Place garden tenders next to plants to automate essential tasks like fertilizing, watering, weeding, and pest control. This means Sims can take time off from their gardening duties without worrying that their crops will die.

The garden tenders are customizable, allowing players to set specific care options and create automatic schedules based on their gardening needs. Suitable for both outdoor and indoor gardens, this mod is perfect for those who want to enjoy the benefits of a luxuriant garden without the time-consuming upkeep.

9 Straight Outta Compost

Turn Trash Into Treasure With A Functional Compost Bin

  • Created by RAVASHEEN
  • Download Here (ravasheen)

The Straight Outta Compost mod brings a functional compost bin to The Sims 4 , allowing players to turn organic waste into fertilizer. Sims can now dispose of food scraps, leaves, and even dust, transforming trash into nurturing compost. This is a practical and eco-friendly way to clear out rotting leftovers and keep homes clean, while also providing a steady supply of fertilizer for gardens.

Players can easily add items to the compost bin by dragging and dropping them individually in live mode or selecting “Add Compostable Items” directly from the bin. At any time, they can check the composting progress by hovering over the bin, and once the process is complete, they can retrieve the finished compost, which is sent straight to their inventory. This handy object fits seamlessly with the Eco Lifestyle pack, making sustainable living even more rewarding for Sims.

8 Autonomous Gardening Mod

Allow Sims To Tend Their Gardens Autonomously

  • Created by LittleMsSam
  • Download Here (Curseforge)

With autonomy settings turned on, there are a handful of interactions that Sims can do autonomously, such as using the computer or television. This mod allows Sims to maintain their garden on their own time, without needing player input. Players who have not cued up any actions for a Sim may autonomously water, weed, spray, fertilize, and evolve their plants.

Players must give their Sims the custom Plant Lover Trait to enable gardening autonomy. Traits can be equipped with UI mods like UI Extension Cheat Mod or manually added with cheats. This trait enables a hidden buff that will encourage them to start gardening within a five-hour time frame. Players can adjust the time this buff occurs and the gardening actions they'd like their Sims to do in the mod's in-game menu.

7 Faster Gardening Mod

Cut Gardening Times In Half

  • Created by Scumbumbo (Updated by LittleMsSam)
  • Download Here (Scumbumbo)

Small gardens may be easy to manage, but it can be quite time-consuming to cultivate large-scale farms and fields. Even skilled Sims who start gardening at sunrise might find themselves working until sundown with all their needs in the red. The Faster Gardening Mod can decrease the time it takes a Sim to complete tasks like weeding and watering plants. It will take one-third less time to do so.

This mod also triples the distance Sims will consider traveling between plants to perform tasks. Sims will no longer get overwhelmed by the amount of work ahead of them and take their gardening in bigger strides.

6 Gardening For All Seasons Mod

Disables Seasonal Affects

  • Created by gettp
  • Download Here (Mod The Sims)

With the release of The Sims 4: Seasons , the game introduced seasons and weather that affect the seasons certain plants can grow. How can players find key ingredients to saving a Sim's life, like the Death Flower, if it is only available in the winter?

The Gardening For All Seasons Mod allows all plants to be harvested year-round. There are over one hundred plants across several different packs that will grow regardless of the current season. It may sound like a simple adjustment, but this means a lot to players who prioritize gardening in The Sims 4 and Sims who depend on their garden to make their living.

5 Maid & Gardener Service Mod

Hire Gardening Help

  • Created by LittleMsSam
  • Download Here (Tumblr)

A Sim's day is often packed with activities like work and travel, so some players might forget to help Sims care for their garden. That's what a personal gardener service is great for. The gardening service comes with the base game, but installing this mod allows Sims to hire this service any time and any day. The gardener will come over to the house and perform actions like watering plants, clearing weeds, and spraying for bugs.

This gardener will come equipped with the Green Thumb reward trait. The gardener will be paid hourly unless the Sim has the Free Services reward trait. They can even help with landscaping upkeep like raking leaves. This mod also adjusts the maid service in The Sims 4 , ensuring they have the Speed Cleaning trait and the ability to work on weekends.

4 Farmer Career Mod

Functional Farmer Career

  • Created by KiaraSims4Mods
  • Download Here (Curseforge)

The Sims 4 has a gardener career, allowing Sims to go to work to continue their passion for gardening, but many were surprised that a farmer career was missing from the Cottage Living expansion. This mod adds the anticipated career to the list of Sims professions. Now, Sims can get paid 25 simoleons per hour for 12-hour shifts, Monday through Friday.

There is no upward mobility or promotions to this career, but there are plenty of work-from-home tasks to keep Sims busy. Complete actions like planting new crops, developing gardening skills, and talking to plants, along with caring for farm animals. This career mod allows Sims to be paid for the work they do on their farm and makes for a more immersive storytelling experience.

3 Fertilize & Evolve All Mod

Fertilize Or Evolve Plants With A Single Click

  • Created by Carl's Guides
  • Download Here (Patreon)

A Simmer could go mad filling their Sim's queues with actions to fertilize each crop that they plant. The famous mod creator Carl sure did. That's why he created the Fertilize & Evolve All Mod. Now, a player can select a stack of fertilizers from their Sims' inventories and fertilize all the plants in their garden. Sims will still take their time to fertilize each plant individually, but it will be much less of a hassle on the player's part.

Along with the fertilizing aspect, this mod also adds a feature for Sims to evolve all plants in their garden with one click. It can be difficult to decipher when a plant is ready to evolve, but players will no longer have to worry. All plants can be evolved at once in one satisfying animation.

2 Herb Garden Mod

Grow Plants In An Organized, Compact Garden

  • Created by icemunmun
  • Download Here (icemunmun)

Sims have the choice of planting their seeds in the ground, pot, or soil patch. For those who love The Sims 4 for aesthetics, building, and clean organization, the Herb Garden Mod could be the perfect addition to the game. Much like the meat wall from the Eco Lifestyle expansion, Sims can plant seeds in the new compact standing garden from build/buy mode for 80 simoleons.

That's not all. This mod also adds new gardening features like plant health and age. Hovering over the herb garden will bring up a display with the plants' stats. Players will no longer have to guess what their plants need. Buy specialty fertilizer, plant medicine, and other garden essentials all in the standing herb garden.

1 Gardening Event Mod

Invite Friends To Help With Gardening

  • Created by Caradriel
  • Download Here (caradriel)

Need more help with garden work? Invite up to 10 of a Sim's friends to come over and participate in a gardening event with this mod. Garden events are perfect if a garden is overgrown and needs to be restored or if a Sim needs extra sets of hands to set up a new one.

The garden event works just like every other social event in The Sims 4 . Complete sets of actions like "Enthuse About Gardening" and "Plant Something 10 Times" in the span of a few hours to reach gold star status and earn rewards like a gardening buff to help with skill building, a money tree plant, and rare seeds.

item.title: Fortnite: How to Get All Venom Skins
item.description:
Fortnite introduces the Symbiotes into the Battle Royale island in the perfect way thanks to Fortnitemares 2024. With a collab between Venom: The Last Dance and Fortnite , more Symbiotes have infected Battle Royale, and now players who want to claim their great power can do so, provided that they have the V-Bucks necessary.

There have been multiple Marvel x Fortnite collabs to bring forth Venom skins in the game, and not including Carnage, there are 4 Symbiotes, with 3 of them featuring as the legendary Venom himself. Whether it's using Eddie Brock as a host or Anne Weying, players can enjoy all the thrills of being the Lethal Protector in Fortnite .

How to Get the Symbiotes Bundle in Fortnite

3,000 V-Bucks

  • Symbiotes Bundle

The Symbiote family grows ever stronger with the Symbiotes Bundle, purchased in the Item Shop for 3,000 V-Bucks. This Bundle comes with 2 skins and a total of 6 items, combining what players would have obtained from She-Venom and Agony into one package, saving them a total of 600 V-Bucks if they wanted to just purchase both skins separately. While neither skin comes with a LEGO Style, it's still a great Bundle for those who can't get enough of the Symbiotes:

Item Name

Item Type

Item Price

She-Venom

Outfit

1,800 V-Bucks

Symbiote Slicers

Back Bling

Comes with She-Venom

Symbiote Slicers

Pickaxe

Comes with She-Venom

Agony

Outfit

1,800 V-Bucks

Llymbiote

Back Bling

Comes with Agony

Electric Symbiotaxe

Pickaxe

Comes with Agony

the Symbiotes Bundle will be removed from the Item Shop on October 31, 8 PM ET.

How to Get She-Venom in Fortnite

1,800 V-Bucks

  • She-Venom Bundle

When Eddie Brock's ex-girlfriend Anne Weying bonded with Venom to try and save Eddie, few would expect her to get her own skin in Fortnite years later. Yet, the beloved She-Venom is here, and players can purchase She-Venom in the Item Shop for 1,800 V-Bucks. While She-Venom does not come with a LEGO Style for LEGO Fortnite , she does come with the Symbiote Slicers Back Bling and the Symbiote Slicers Pickaxe, allowing players to dual-wield and carry two versions of Venoms in the palms of their hands.

She-Venom will be removed from the Item Shop on October 31, 8 PM ET.

How to Get Agony in Fortnite

1,800 V-Bucks

Agony Bundle

Agony's entrance to Fortnite is a welcome surprise, as it wasn't confirmed she was involved in the new Venom movie until she invaded the Item Shop. Those who can't get enough of the Symbiotes, or simply want a grinning purple one to add to their collection, can do so by purchasing Agony for 1,800 V-Bucks. This price also provides them with the Llymbiote Back Bling and the Electric Symbiotaxe Pickaxe, but Agony does not come with a LEGO Style for use in LEGO Fortnite .

Agony will be removed from the Item Shop on October 31, 8 PM ET.

How to Get Eddie Brock (& Venom) in Fortnite

2,000 V-Bucks

To celebrate the release of Venom: Let There Be Carnage , Sony and Fortnite teamed to bring Tom Hardy's Eddie Brock to Fortnite for 2,000 V-Bucks. Eddie and Venom make a great but odd couple, and using the built-in Venom Unleashed emote, players would be able to transform into the movie version of Venom, complete with the black goo, lack of spider symbol, and of course the Venom toes. Joining Eddie was the Symbiote Scythe Pickaxe and the Tendrils of Venom Back Bling.

Sadly, Eddie Brock hasn't returned to the Item Shop since December 29, 2021, almost 3 years ago. However, with the release of Venom: The Last Dance , there is still hope, especially since reliable Fortnite leaker Shiina posted on X (Formerly Twitter) that Eddie Brock has been updated for an Item Shop release:

This article will update if Eddie Brock and Venom become available in the Fortnite Item Shop.

How to Get Venom in Fortnite

2,000 V-Bucks

It's hard to beat the classic, and this variant of Venom seems to be the original Lethal Protector in all his glorious form and complicated relationship with Eddie Brock. The main version of Venom is purchasable in the Item Shop for 2,000 V-Bucks but hasn't been seen since August 31, 2023, over a year ago. With the release of new Symbiote skins and the potential return of Eddie Brock, fans can hold out hope that Venom will grace the Fortnite Item Shop soon during Fortnitemares 2024, allowing players to grab a great skin in addition to the Extreme Style, Tendril Tote Back Bling, built-in Symbiote Slasher Pickaxe, and the built-in We Are Venom Emote.
